1886.name: Solar Energy
1886.datasetName: Investment in renewables by technology - IRENA (2017)
1886.s_name: Investment in renewables by technology - IRENA (2017)

source.name: Investment in renewables by technology - IRENA (2017)
source.dataPublisherSource: Frankfurt School-UNEP Centre/BNEF (2017). Global Trends in Renewable Energy Investment 2017. Available at: http://fs-unep-centre.org/sites/default/files/publications/globaltrendsinrenewableenergyinvestment2017.pdf
source.additionalInfo:
Renewable investment figures are measured in billion USD per year. Investment adjusts for re-invested equity, and includes estimates for undisclosed deals.

Figures excludes investments in large hydropower schemes.
